sentences.en: And because farmers are not shipping livestock, meat production in Britain, at least, has virtually ceased.
sentences.cn: 由于英国农场主已停止转运牲畜 、 肉类, 至少, 眼下的情况是这样.

sentences.en: At the county fair last year, prizes were given for the best farm products and livestock.
sentences.cn: 在去年全县交易会上, 最好的农产品和家畜都得了奖.

sentences.en: Both men and livestock are flourishing.
Farmers were encouraged to keep their livestock in pens rather than letting them roam freely.
sentences.cn: 鼓励农民们把家畜关进栏圈，而不是让它们到处乱跑。

sentences.en: Modern farms are enterprising businesses which keep only the livestock that can pay its way.
sentences.cn: 现在的农场是富于创业精神的企业单位,它只饲养能出售以赢利的家畜.

sentences.en: Noise from the livestock cloaked any sound from the . road.
sentences.cn: 牲口的喧闹声掩盖了一切路边的声音.

sentences.en: Richard tuned in the noon livestock reports, looked over at her, and shook his head.
sentences.cn: 理查德把收音机转到畜情报告节目, 转过来看看她, 摇摇头.

sentences.en: The farmer's land produced enough pasture to feed all of his livestock.
sentences.cn: 那个农民的土地上生产了足够他全部牲畜吃的牧草.

sentences.en: The heavy rains and flooding killed scores of livestock.
sentences.cn: 暴雨和大水淹死了许多牲口。

sentences.en: There were cows, pigs and other livestock there.
sentences.cn: 那儿也有牛 、 猪和其他家畜.

sentences.en: There were cows, pigs and other livestock.
sentences.cn: 有牛, 猪和其它家畜.

sentences.en: They cramped the livestock in the ancient barns.
sentences.cn: 他们把牲畜关在老谷仓里.

sentences.en: To make matters worse, antimicrobials have been introduced into hand creams, household cleansers, livestock feed.
sentences.cn: 更糟糕的是, 抗微生物药物已被掺合进擦手霜 、 家庭清洁剂和牲畜饲料中.

sentences.en: Water the livestock when you feed them.
sentences.cn: 给家畜喂食时要给它们饮水.

sentences.en: We're fattening the livestock up for slaughter.
sentences.cn: 我们正在催肥牲畜待宰杀.

phrases.tran_cn: 畜牧业，畜牧饲养；家畜繁育
畜牧场；禽畜饲养场；牧场

trans.tran_en: animals such as cows and sheep that are kept on a farm
